mapper.select: select product_no productno, product_name productname, product_price productprice, product_image productimage, product_kind productkind from product_real
mapper.update: merge into product_real r using (select * from product_test) p on ( r.product_name = p.product_name) when matched then update set r.product_price = p.product_price when not matched then insert (r.product_no,r.product_name,r.product_price,r.product_image,r.product_kind,r.product_content,r.create_date) values (p.product_no,p.product_name,p.product_price,p.product_image,p.product_kind,p.product_content,p.create_date)
